commit.message:
dwarf2cfi: Rename cfi_insn to add_cfi_insn.

Make it consistent with add_cfi_vec.

        * dwarf2cfi.c (add_cfi_insn): Rename from cfi_insn.  Update all users.

From-SVN: r176698
